column1: Little Goat Diner//// But what can you say? "You seem nice
column2: but can you please tell management they just F*%#@ed up everything? Maybe they should try a craft shop?". The menu just isn't good. It's not thought through
column4: there are almost NO vegetarian options
column5: bacon is a cool fad but it doesn't fix bad dishes
column6: too much oil. It's feels like a menu made by someone from cooking school who has never actually worked in a restaurant or cooked for fun at home. TRY YOUR OWN DISHES
column7: little goat. and expect to go for a really long run after that too.
